version_description:
Finally the application now supports auto-saving changes you do in the app to restore it automatically when you open app again even if you close app completely, your settings are preserved in your phone storage.
It could especially be frustrating when you construct your merge signal and then you lose these changes after you close the app. Now, this has been resolved !
